member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: This contract will retrieve the latest version of all agreed data for in-process amendments or other modifications against approved protocols.
member.returns: This contract will output one "row" (specific format: Study) for each protocol which has an in-progress amendment or other modification;

member.summary: This contract will retrieve the latest version of all Pre-Submission protocols with ClinicalPreReviewInvestigatorInitiated field set to Yes.
member.returns: This contract will output one "row" (specific format: Study) for Pre-Submission protocol which has ClinicalPreReviewInvestigatorInitiated field set to Yes;

member.summary: Default constructor which takes the injection of 3 data managers. Unity prefers/requires? dependency injection in CTORs. The data managers are injected primarily to support unit testing.

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Controllers.IrbRecordUpdatesForCrmsController.Get(System.DateTime)
member.summary: This contract will retrieve the latest version of all agreed data for each record which has changed, including new records which meet the agreed criteria, within a specified date window.
member.param: This date will be the date to retrieve data “since,” i.e. the minimum date in the date window.
member.returns: One “row” (specific format: Study) for each protocol for whom any of the data field defined below have changed since the start date.

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Controllers.IrbRecordUpdatesForCrmsController.Get(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: This contract will retrieve the latest version of all agreed data for each record which has changed, including new records which meet the agreed criteria, within a specified date window.
member.param: This date will be the date to retrieve data “since,” i.e. the minimum date in the date window.

This date will be the date to retrieve data “until,” i.e. the maximum date in the date window. If not specified it will assume today is the maximum date. This date will also be the “as-of” date for the purpose of determining the “latest version”.
member.returns: One “row” (specific format: Study) for each protocol for whom any of the data field defined below have changed in the date window specified.

member.name: T:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Controllers.IrbStudyStatusHistoryUpdatesForCrmsController
member.summary: APIController for SC2 (GetIrbStudyStatusHistoryUpdatesForCrms).

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Controllers.IrbStudyStatusHistoryUpdatesForCrmsController.#ctor(ORA.Data.WebIrb.Staging.IDataManagerWebIrbStaging)
member.summary: The data manager is injected primarily to support unit testing.

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Controllers.IrbStudyStatusHistoryUpdatesForCrmsController.Get(System.DateTime)
member.summary: This contract will retrieve all external status changes which have occurred for each record which has undergone one or more external status changes within a specified date window.
member.param: This date will be the date to retrieve data “since,” i.e. the minimum date in the date window.
member.returns: The contract will output one “row” (specific format: StudyStatusHistory) for each study that has at least one external status change in its protocol or any of its amendments, continuing reviews and post approval reports in the date window specified. The “row” of data will contain the data fields for filtering study and a list of all external status changes that have occurred in the date window specified.

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Controllers.IrbStudyStatusHistoryUpdatesForCrmsController.Get(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: This contract will retrieve all external status changes which have occurred for each record which has undergone one or more external status changes within a specified date window.
member.param: This date will be the date to retrieve data “since,” i.e. the minimum date in the date window.
This date will be the date to retrieve data “until,” i.e. the maximum date in the date window.
member.returns: The contract will output one “row” (specific format: StudyStatusHistory) for each study that has at least one external status change in its protocol or any of its amendments, continuing reviews and post approval reports in the date window specified. The “row” of data will contain the data fields for filtering study and a list of all external status changes that have occurred in the date window specified.

member.param: The data manager to inject into the class

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Interfaces.IIrbCrmsControllerService.GetChangedStudies(System.DateTime,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: SC1 in the Requirements from IRB CRMS requires the ability to get the latest data for all studies for which data changed in a specified date window.
member.returns: Enumerable format of studies that meet the CRMS data specification

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Interfaces.IIrbCrmsControllerService.GetStudyChangedHistory(System.DateTime,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: SC2 in the Requirements from IRB CRMS requires the ability to get all status changes for studies in the specified date window. Compared to SC1 which only gets the latest version of all changed data.
member.returns: Study state history in the CRMS data specification, this may be multiple rows per study

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Interfaces.IIrbCrmsControllerService.GetPreSubmissions
member.summary: SC3 in the Requirements from IRB CRMS requires the ability to get all Pre-Submission Protocol with the question for the field ClinicalPreReviewInvestigatorInitiatedFlag set to Yes
member.returns: Enumerable format of studies that meet the CRMS data specification

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Interfaces.IIrbCrmsControllerService.GetChangedAmendments
member.summary: Separate from SC1 but returning the same data type, CRMS expects to receive data for amendments- in-flight to facilitate parallel processing. Amendments in the IRB system are just like studies but they need the data before the amendment is "approved". Once the amendment is "approved" in WebIRB its data becomes the study data. In this context the expected behavior is that the amendment data would stop showing up in this contract but the SC1 GetChangedStudies() method would have one new row to return.
member.returns: Enumerable format of studies that meet the CRMS data specification, only including in-process amendments

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Interfaces.IIrbCrmsControllerService.GetStudyByUniqueId(System.Int32)
member.summary: The requirements don't specify the need to retrieve a specific study by unique id but for troubleshooting purposes they're likely to expect it or want it later.
member.param: Persistent Unique ID of the Study
member.returns: Study in CRMS Facade Format

member.name: T:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Interfaces.IIrbCrmsConverter
member.summary: Describes a simple collection of helper methods which convert between ORA.Domain.Model.HumanSubjects data and ORA.Services.Protocols.Human data.
Converts a ORA Domain Study object into a Service Study object. Be careful about null pointers. ORA.Domain contains complex objects and does not instantiate them with default CTORs all the time.
member.returns: ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Models.Study

member.summary:
Converts an enumeration of ORA.Domain studies into an enumeration of Service Study. This is likely to be a critical method in this service.
Be careful about null pointers. ORA.Domain contains complex objects and does not instantiate them with default CTORs all the time.

member.name: M:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Interfaces.IIrbCrmsConverter.GetStatusHistoryFacades(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ORA.Domain.Model.HumanSubjects.Study})
member.summary:
Converts an enumeration of ORA.Domain studies into an enumeration of Services Status History facades.
Be careful about null pointers. ORA.Domain contains complex objects and does not instantiate them with default CTORs all the time.
member.returns: IEnumerable of WebIRBCRMS.Models.StatusHistory

member.summary: Implementation of IIrbCrmsConverter.GetStudyFacade() which uses Linq to Object.
member.returns: study in service model

member.summary: Implementation of IIrbCrmsConverter.GetStudyFacades() which uses Linq to Object.
member.returns: List of Study in service model

member.summary: Implementation of IIrbCrmsConverter.GetStatusHistoryFacade() which uses Linq to Object.
member.returns: StatusHistory in service model

member.name: T:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Models.Study
member.summary: The CRMS representation of an IRB Study/Protocol. The destination object for our IRB data which will be presented directly for RESTful serialization to the consumer. The bulk of the contract effort currently centers around this object.

member.name: T:ORA.Services.WebIRBCRMS.Models.StudyStatusHistory
member.summary: This is the CRMS requested stateful study history, one persistent ID and a list of the study states in time.
